Building my first educational game, having issues with the Room Description Layout numbers....
I seem to change them, but after I edit other items in the game, they seem to revert to the regular 1-2-3-4...?

Also when I change the values, the Save button is not available to save?
It just remains gray and un-clickable?
Thanks

Posts.EditableText: Yes, that seems to be a problem. So after you enter the numbers, before you move off that page, click one of the check boxes off and then back on again. That will force it to save.
